help_command_descriptions.name: help
help_command_descriptions.description:
A list of all commands (or a specific command) and their functions.
Usage: ~help <command (optional)>

help_command_descriptions.name: hello
help_command_descriptions.description:
Say Hello to the bot.
Usage: ~hello

help_command_descriptions.name: rps
help_command_descriptions.description:
Play Rock, Paper, Scissors with the bot!
Usage: ~rps <choice> where choice can be either rock, paper, or scissor

help_command_descriptions.name: ttt
help_command_descriptions.description:
Play Tic Tac Toe with the bot!
Usage: ~ttt start to start a game

help_command_descriptions.name: roles
help_command_descriptions.description:
A list of all assignable roles in the server.
Usage: ~roles

help_command_descriptions.name: calc
help_command_descriptions.description:
A list of all commands and their functions.
Usage: ~calc <expr> where expr is a mathematical expression
Example: 1+(2x3)

help_command_descriptions.name: exchange
help_command_descriptions.description:
A tool to get exchange rates between two currencies.
Usage: ~exchange <from currency> <to currency>
Example: ~exchange USD CAD

help_command_descriptions.name: suggest
help_command_descriptions.description:
Send in your server suggestions anonymously to be voted on.
Usage: ~suggest <suggestion>
Example: ~suggest Make the server great again!
